text: get those taste buds ready because we
are making escargot in the lovely garden
surrounding Chateau DJ in Burgundy
France you will need 12 to 16 snails 10
more L 1 minced shallot 6 slices of
quality bacon finely chopped 1
tablespoon of butter 1 diced zucchini 1
cup of apple juice 1 cup of heavy cream
1 finely sliced green apple 3 fresh sage
leaves finely chopped and salt and
pepper to taste
